OrgName.entry: MDF THE BIPOLAR ORGANISATION, SHEFFIELD SELF-HELP SUPPORT GROUP

AltName.entry: SHEFFIELD MANIC DEPRESSION SELF-HELP GROUP (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Part of a national charity. A self-help group for people with bi-polar disorder (manic depression) and their carers. Aims to educate members about manic depression and related issues.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building
